#T_SP=webanno.custom.Customentity|identifiier|value
#Text=(& USE TURNER’S BLACKING.
#Text=NOTICE.
#Text=—How delightful to see a Lady or Gentleman’s beautiful black shinine; Boot or Shoe reflecting every surrounding object in TURNERS UNRIVALLED BLACKING.

#Text=This invaluable composition may be had wholesale and retail at iheDorsot County Chroniclefand Somersetshire Gazette Office, and retail of all respectable shopkeepers,iu stone bottles, at 6d., Is., and JBd. each.
#Text=A CHALLENGE.
#Text=I challenge the world to produce, if it can, A Blacking thats equal to Turner’s Japan ; For like crystal it shines, while it softens the leather.
#Text=And makes your boots proof ’gainst the wind and the weather.
#Text=Why the praises of Turner’s Japan should 1 tell.
#Text=When those who have used it must know it so well ?
#Text=Why should coachmen still brush at old harness in vain, When this blacking can give it fresh lustre again?
#Text=For, without second sight, 1 can prophesy soon, That you will see it adopted by Foot and Dragoon ; For you scarcely can tell, when drawn up on parade.
#Text=Which glitters the brightest, the boot or the blade.
#Text=The Gentlemen too, who would boast their attire.
#Text=And feel for respect so profound a desire.
#Text=May hear the fair Ladies, if Turner’s they use, Cry, How charmingly polished his manners and shoes?
#Text=Ye Authors and Poets who gladly engage To reform and instruct this degenerate age.
#Text=Use Turner’s Japan and your fame will take root, Then your genius will shine as well as your boot.
#Text=Though Davy and Home have astonished the world.
#Text=And the chemical volume of nature unfurl’d.
#Text=Vet in chemistry surely there something was larking, Till Turner discover’d his wonderful Blacking.
#Text=Who do not feel pride in a Wellington’s name.
#Text=When the whole of the universe rings with his famet So are Turner and Wellington famous afar.
#Text=One the hero of Blacking, the other of War!!

#Text=Gentlemen may observe tnat this Composition, when used fot their Gig and Carriage Harness, after one or two applications will produce a brilliant, rich, glossy black lustre, and at the »aine time act as a preserver of the leather.
#Text=HICJiARU TLHNER.
